spec_data.Name: python-zope-sqlalchemy
spec_data.Description:
The aim of this package is to unify the plethora of existing packages
integrating SQLAlchemy with Zope's transaction management. As such it seeks
only to provide a data manager and makes no attempt to define a zopeish way to
configure engines.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 05:22:49 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
